With a talented voice cast, including John Goodman and Billy Crystal, this film is sure to delight viewers of all ages.

"Taken," on the other hand, is an action-packed thriller that follows a former CIA agent who must rescue his daughter from a group of ruthless kidnappers. With Liam Neeson in the lead role and a gripping plot full of twists and turns, this movie will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.
